column5: Has anyone fished Hamilton Harbour for pike since the ice has started to recede ?
still lots of ice down there my friend. another couple weeks and it should be good!
Alas, in a couple of week they'll be out of season..
Season ends in one week and my favorite spot FROZE OVER AGAIN!!!!!!~!! This getting stupid now!
Might wana try icefishing, still safe.
Hi I was LaSalle Marina in Burlington a few days ago. The Ice was gone. A 39'' female was landed and released just yesterday. I guess nobody from the OFC has fished there for pike recently?  Cheers
Heard about that on another board, but why don't you fish Laselle instead of watching the ice melt at Hamilton. Pike closes in a week, not too much time left.
